verses.verse: And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>, five <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> long <S%H753><s%>, and five <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> broad <S%H7341><s%>; the altar <S%H4196><s%> shall be foursquare <S%H7251><s%>: and the height <S%H6967><s%> thereof shall be three <S%H7969><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> the horns <S%H7161><s%> of it upon the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H6438><s%> thereof <S%H7161><s%>; the horns thereof shall be of one piece with it <S%H6823><s%>: and thou shalt overlay it with brass <S%H5178><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> its pots <S%H5518><s%> to take away its ashes <S%H1878><s%>, and its shovels <S%H3257><s%>, and its basins <S%H4219><s%>, and its flesh-hooks <S%H4207><s%>, and its firepans <S%H4289><s%>: all the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> for it a grating <S%H4345><s%> of network <S%H4639><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%>; and upon the net <S%H7568><s%> shalt thou make <S%H6213><s%> four <S%H702><s%> brazen <S%H5178><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> in the four <S%H702><s%> corners thereof <S%H7098><s%>.

And thou shalt put <S%H5414><s%> it under the ledge <S%H3749><s%> round the altar <S%H4196><s%> beneath <S%H4295><s%>, that the net <S%H7568><s%> may reach <S%H5704><s%> halfway <S%H2677><s%> up the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> staves <S%H905><s%> for the altar <S%H4196><s%>, staves <S%H905><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>, and overlay <S%H6823><s%> them with brass <S%H5178><s%>.

And the staves <S%H905><s%> thereof shall be put <S%H935><s%> into the rings <S%H2885><s%>, and the staves <S%H905><s%> shall be upon the two <S%H8147><s%> sides <S%H6763><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>, in bearing it <S%H5375><s%>.
Hollow <S%H5014><s%> with planks <S%H3871><s%> shalt thou make <S%H6213><s%> it <S%H7200><s%>: as it hath been showed thee in the mount <S%H2022><s%>, so shall they make it <S%H6213><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> the court <S%H2691><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>: for the south <S%H5045><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> southward <S%H8486><s%> there shall be hangings <S%H7050><s%> for the court <S%H2691><s%> of fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%> a hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> long <S%H753><s%> for one <S%H259><s%> side <S%H6285><s%>:

and the pillars <S%H5982><s%> thereof shall be twenty <S%H6242><s%>, and their sockets <S%H134><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%>, of brass <S%H5178><s%>; the hooks <S%H2053><s%> of the pillars <S%H5982><s%> and their fillets <S%H2838><s%> shall be of silver <S%H3701><s%>.

And likewise for the north <S%H6828><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> in length <S%H753><s%> there shall be hangings <S%H7050><s%> a hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits long <S%H753><s%>, and the pillars <S%H5982><s%> thereof twenty <S%H6242><s%>, and their sockets <S%H134><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%>, of brass <S%H5178><s%>; the hooks <S%H2053><s%> of the pillars <S%H5982><s%>, and their fillets <S%H2838><s%>, of silver <S%H3701><s%>.

And for the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> on the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> shall be hangings <S%H7050><s%> of fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>; their pillars <S%H5982><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%>, and their sockets <S%H134><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%>.
And the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> on the east <S%H6924><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%> shall be fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>.

The hangings <S%H7050><s%> for the one side <S%H3802><s%> of the gate shall be fifteen <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>; their pillars <S%H5982><s%> three <S%H7969><s%>, and their sockets <S%H134><s%> three <S%H7969><s%>.

And for the other <S%H8145><s%> side <S%H3802><s%> shall be hangings <S%H7050><s%> of fifteen <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H5982><s%>; their pillars three <S%H7969><s%>, and their sockets <S%H134><s%> three <S%H7969><s%>.

And for the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> shall be a screen <S%H4539><s%> of twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>, of blue <S%H8504><s%>, and purple <S%H713><s%>, and scarlet <S%H8144><s%>, and fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%>, the work of the embroiderer <S%H7551><s%>; their pillars <S%H5982><s%> four <S%H702><s%>, and their sockets <S%H134><s%> four <S%H702><s%>.

All the pillars <S%H5982><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> shall be filleted <S%H2836><s%> with silver <S%H3701><s%>; their hooks <S%H2053><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>, and their sockets <S%H134><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%>.

The length <S%H753><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> shall be a hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>, and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> every where <S%H2572><s%>, and the height <S%H6967><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>, of fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%>, and their sockets <S%H134><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%>.

All the instruments <S%H3627><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> in all the service <S%H5656><s%> thereof <S%H3489><s%>, and all the pins thereof <S%H3489><s%>, and all the pins of the court <S%H2691><s%>, shall be of brass <S%H5178><s%>.

And thou shalt command <S%H6680><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that they bring <S%H3947><s%> unto thee pure <S%H2134><s%> olive <S%H2132><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> beaten <S%H3795><s%> for the light <S%H3974><s%>, to cause a lamp <S%H5216><s%> to burn <S%H5927><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%>.

In the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, without <S%H2351><s%> the veil <S%H6532><s%> which is before the testimony <S%H5715><s%>, Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall keep it in order <S%H6186><s%> from evening <S%H6153><s%> to morning <S%H1242><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: it shall be a statute <S%H2708><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> throughout their generations <S%H1755><s%> on the behalf of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
